UI.noInput: Please answer before viewing the solution

question: When Story Land, a children’s museum in New Hampshire, reopened, it utilized public relations. Numerous local television stations picked up and reported the story, providing free marketing to potential customers. The company bet on the positive virality of its press release, which worked in its favor. Which of the following disadvantages explains why Story Land “bet on the positive virality”?

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: That’s not correct. Although the news stations picked up the story, there was still no guarantee of results.
That’s not correct. Increased sales is an advantage of public relations.
That’s not correct. Increased brand recognition is an advantage of public relations.
The company had no direct control over whether the press release would be picked up by news stations.

detailedSolution: The company had no direct control over whether the press release would be picked up by news stations.
